descriptor.label: TVG480

descriptor.desc: Which control mode has Videoipath over the device.
descriptor.label: Control Mode

descriptor.desc: Standard control mode where Videoipath assumes it is the only master of a resource and takes full control over it.
descriptor.label: Full control

descriptor.desc: Special control mode where Videoipath shares a resource with another external system. Videoipath assumes no control over the resource unless a connection is active. In addition, before establishing a connection the configuration is backed up on the resource and reloaded when the connection is ended.
descriptor.label: Partial control with config restore

descriptor.desc: Config slot to use when partial control with config restore is used.
descriptor.label: Partial control config slot
